mdRecord.dcterms:title: Les provinces des Pays-Bas Catholiques ou A most exact map of Flanders or ye Austrian Netherlands &c. : It comprehends all the towns, villages, abbeys, monasteries throughout all these provinces &c.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Moll, Herman, -1732
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 61 x 100 cm. on sheet 64 x 106 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:publisher: Sold by H. Moll over against Devereux Court between Temple Bar and St. Clements Church in ye Strand. I. Bowles Print and Map seller at the Black Horse in Cornhill & T. Bowles Print and mapseller next to ye Chapter house in S. Pauls Ch. yard. And John King at the Globe in the Poultry.
